name: checkSystemHealth
body: {"id": "", "label": "", "steps": [{"id": "51ff08f9-898b-4ad4-889c-af23718a0068", "label": "initHealthStatus", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus = {database: '', api: '', storage: '', errors: [], overall: '', timestamp: ''}", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "Initialize health status", "executionMode": "async"}, {"id": "d6c1e4c5-e664-48fb-8f2e-99cc7d01ee91", "label": "checkDatabase", "params": {"path": "/health/database", "method": "GET", "baseUrl": "#baseApiUrl"}, "onError": [{"id": "8487157a-d251-4631-8980-0335c67518e5", "label": "logDatabaseError", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus.database = 'error'; #_appData.healthStatus.errors.push('Database connection failed')", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}], "actionId": "restApi", "onSuccess": [{"id": "ab13c0d0-a025-4dc8-8aca-d828036ccb46", "label": "logDatabaseSuccess", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus.database = 'healthy'", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}], "actionType": "callback", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}, {"id": "052398eb-4c97-4536-953c-e14487947948", "label": "checkAPI", "params": {"path": "/health/api", "method": "GET", "baseUrl": "#baseApiUrl"}, "onError": [{"id": "1485a1b9-a962-4609-8f42-abac00af6d28", "label": "logAPIError", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus.api = 'error'; #_appData.healthStatus.errors.push('API service failed')", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}], "actionId": "restApi", "onSuccess": [{"id": "32eb9d1c-c3da-4e11-9136-14f36435c9c6", "label": "logAPISuccess", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus.api = 'healthy'", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}], "actionType": "callback", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}, {"id": "4c9cf2e8-d8a3-4738-9e10-bda44f48518d", "label": "checkStorage", "params": {"path": "/health/storage", "method": "GET", "baseUrl": "#baseApiUrl"}, "onError": [{"id": "750b2c17-855d-4319-b6a4-a2d2df130260", "label": "logStorageError", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus.storage = 'error'; #_appData.healthStatus.errors.push('Storage service failed')", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}], "actionId": "restApi", "onSuccess": [{"id": "dd80fdd0-54e8-428f-a303-3256c5655486", "label": "logStorageSuccess", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus.storage = 'healthy'", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}], "actionType": "callback", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}, {"id": "f2e746e1-85c7-42a9-8fd3-9368c6b49afa", "label": "generateReport", "params": null, "execute": "#_appData.healthStatus.overall = #_appData.healthStatus.errors.length == 0 ? 'healthy' : 'degraded'; #_appData.healthStatus.timestamp = new Date().toISOString()", "actionId": "expression", "actionType": "expression", "description": "", "executionMode": "async"}], "flowId": "", "actionId": "", "description": "Check system health status", "executionMode": "asyncMode"}
